channel.title: Lee Vining|Mono County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Lee Vining|Mono County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-395 North Approaching CA-120
item.description: US-395 north approaching CA-120 east to Tioga Pass and Yosemite. Tioga Pass is closed when this picture was taken.

item.title: CA-120 East at US-395
item.description: CA-120 east at US-395. Turn right for US-395 south to Bishop and Mammoth Lakes. Turn left for US-395 north to Lee Vining and Reno. Turn right to continue east on CA-120.

item.title: CA-120 East at US-395
item.description: CA-120 east at US-395. Turn right for US-395 north to Lee Vining; left for US-395 south to Bishop. Turn right on US-395 to continue east on CA-120.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching CA-120
item.description: US-395 north approaching CA-120 east to Tioga Pass and Yosemite. Tioga Pass was opened the day after this picture was taken.

item.title: Distance Marker on US-395 South
item.description: Distance marker to CA-158 (North), CA-120 East, and Los Angeles, just south of CA-120 West

item.title: US-395 South CA-120 West
item.description: US-395 south at CA-120 west to Tioga Pass/Yosemite
